eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Transaction object that rotates around and needs to be enriched
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: transaction

events.inlineCode:
const obj = objects[0]
const pivot = runtimeScene.getObjects("pivot_point")[0]
obj.getVariables().get("pivot_spawn_rotation").setNumber(pivot.getAngle())

events.name: Rotate the transaction around the pivot

events.inlineCode:
const obj = objects[0]
const pivot = runtimeScene.getObjects("pivot_point")[0]
const distance = obj.getBehavior("transaction")._behaviorData["distance_from_pivot"]
const spawn_rotation = obj.getVariables().get("pivot_spawn_rotation").getAsNumber()
const starting_location = obj.getBehavior("transaction")._behaviorData["starting_location"]
const angle = (starting_location - (pivot.getAngle() - spawn_rotation)) % 360 * -1;
obj.getVariables().get("current_rotation").setNumber(angle)
objects[0].putAroundObject(pivot, distance, angle)

events.name: Create and link an enriched trail particle emitter

events.inlineCode:
const emitter = runtimeScene.createObject("enriched_trail")
runtimeScene.linkedObjectsManager.linkObjects(objects[0], emitter)
emitter.setX(-100)
emitter.setY(-100)
emitter.setAngle(180)

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The pressable button to enrich transactions
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: button

eventsFunctions.description: Pulses the button when it is pressed
eventsFunctions.name: pressed_pulse

events.inlineCode:
const scale = 1.9
const easing = "linear"
const duration = 50 
const destroyObjectWhenFinished = false

const obj = objects[0]
const tween = obj.getBehavior("Tween")
tween.addObjectScaleTween("scale-pulse", scale, scale, easing, duration, destroyObjectWhenFinished)

const targetScale = 0.8
const targetArea = runtimeScene.getObjects("target_area")[0]
const targetTween = targetArea.getBehavior("Tween")
targetTween.addObjectScaleTween("scale-pulse", targetScale, targetScale, easing, duration, destroyObjectWhenFinished)

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: For the buttons on the game scene that transition back to the splash screen
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: back

events.inlineCode:
const scale = 1.5
const easing = "linear"
const duration = 1000
const destroyObjectWhenFinished = false

const obj = objects[0]
const tween = obj.getBehavior("Tween")
const colour = obj.getBehavior("background")._behaviorData["current_colour"]
const current_tween = obj.getBehavior("background")._behaviorData["tweening_colour"]

if (colour === current_tween) {
    return
}

obj.getBehavior("background")._behaviorData["tweening_colour"] = colour

tween.addObjectColorTween("colour-pulse", colour, easing, duration, destroyObjectWhenFinished)
